title: Kawaikereba Hentai demo Suki ni Natte Kuremasu ka?
synopsis: As far as it goes, many boys, especially in their teenage years, want to have a girlfriend. Keiki Kiryuu is no exception. One eventful afternoon, his days of yearning for a lover seem to come to an end when he receives a love letter from an anonymous senderâ€”along with a pair of white panties.
